definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[שִׁלְשׁׂם]] and (less oft.) [[שִׁלְשׁוֹם]]:25 adv. = three days ago, specif. day before yesterday (Kö:ii. 1. 255 f. Lag:BN 20 Anm. Ba:NB § 216 b);—in phr. ´[[תְּמוֹל שׁ]]: Ex 5:8 yesterday (and) day before, idiomat. for hitherto, so Ru 2:11, ´[[אֶתְמוֹל שׁ]]: 1Sa 4:7; ´[[שׁ]] :´[[כִּת]]: Ge 31:2, Ge 31:5 (E), Ex 5:7, Ex 5:14 (J), 2Ki 13:5, cf. 1Sa 14:21, 1Sa 19:7; ´[[גַּם־שׁ]] :´[[גַּם־ת]]: Ex 4:10 (J), 2Sa 3:17, 1Ch 11:2, cf. 2Sa 5:2; ´[[שׁ]] :´[[מִתּ]]: from aforetime, previously Ex 21:29, Ex 21:36 (E), De 4:42, De 19:4, De 19:6, Jos 4:18 (J), Jos 3:4, Jos 20:5 (both R), cf. 1Sa 10:11; ´[[שׁ]] :´[[כִּת]]: 1Sa 21:6 as formerly (but Bu ´[[שׁ]] :´[[מִתּ]]: = for some days).—´[[שׁ]]: Pr 22:20 Kt is difficult; Qr [[שָׁלִשִׁים]] (v. III. [[שָׁלִישׁ]]) is imposs.; supply perhaps [[תְּמוֹל]] have I not thee heretofore, etc.?
